title: 在中餐馆 At a Chinese restaurant

conversations.english: It's very nice of you to invite me.
conversations.chinese: 你真是太好了，请我来做客。
conversations.reply_english: I'm very glad you could come, Mr. Liu. Will you take a seat at the head of the table? It's an informal dinner, please don't stand on ceremony... Mr. Liu, would you like to have some chicken?
conversations.reply_chinese: 刘先生，您能来我很高兴，请上坐。这是一次家常便饭，请大家别客气。刘先生，要吃点鸡肉吗？

conversations.english: Mom, I just finished my paper. Can you proofread it before I hand it in？
conversations.chinese: 妈，我刚完成我的报告。你可以在我交给老师前帮忙校对吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure, let's take a look. Sweetie, this is terrific. Your ideas are so original.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，我们一起看看吧。甜心，写得很好。你的想法很有创意。

conversations.english: Hi Anna, come in.
conversations.chinese: 你好！安娜，请进！
conversations.reply_english: Wow, your apartment is a mess.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哇！你的公寓真乱。

title: 到红绿灯路口过马路吧

conversations.english: Let's cross here.
conversations.chinese: 我们从这里穿过去吧。
conversations.reply_english: You're kidding. We'll never make it across in one piece! Let's cross at the light.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你开什么玩笑！我们穿过去会没命的！咱们还是到红绿灯口再过吧。

conversations.english: Have you bought War Craft 2 yet?
conversations.chinese: 你买了“战争二代”没有?
conversations.reply_english: Yeah!I bought it the day it was released.
conversations.reply_chinese: 买了!它发行的当天我就买了。

conversations.english: Hello, Mr. Smith, Wang Peng speaks.
conversations.chinese: 史密斯先生，你好。我是王朋。
conversations.reply_english: Hello! Mr. Wang. this is Smith.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，王先生，我是史密斯。

title: 我们一起去跳舞怎么样

conversations.english: Steven, would you like to go dance with us tonight?
conversations.chinese: 史蒂文，今晚和 我们一起去跳舞怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: John, I am just not in the mood for this.
conversations.reply_chinese: 约翰，我现在没那个心情。

conversations.english: Anna, that outfit looks wonderful on you! The color goes with your trousers perfectly.
conversations.chinese: 安娜，你穿那套衣服真好看。颜色和你裤子的颤色正好相配。
conversations.reply_english: Thanks, Carla. That's quite a compliment coming from you. You always dress so tastefully.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢，卡拉。你过奖了。你穿衣服一直很有品味。

conversations.english: Alice, I never knew you had such a lovely voice. You really can sing, can't you?
conversations.chinese: 艾丽斯，我不知道你有这么好的嗓。你唱得真不赖，不是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Thanks, Mark. I used to be a member of the school choir.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你，马克。我过去是学校合唱团的成员。

conversations.english: John, you look pale. What happened?
conversations.chinese: 约翰，你面色苍白。怎么了？
conversations.reply_english: I stayed up last night.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我昨晚熬夜了。

conversations.english: Steven, why are you so depressed?
conversations.chinese: 史蒂文，为什么这么沮丧啊？
conversations.reply_english: I'm feeling very sad. I just read the newspaper.
conversations.reply_chinese: 刚刚看了报纸，我觉得伤心。

conversations.english: Hello, Mary. Nice day, isn't it?
conversations.chinese: 你好，玛莉。天气真好，不是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, what a wonderful day! The sky has cleared up in the end.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，多美好的一天啊！天终于睛了。

conversations.english: Good morning, Paul!
conversations.chinese: 早上好，保罗！
conversations.reply_english: Hi, good morning, you are so early today.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，早上好，你今天这么早。

conversations.english: Jennifer, would you like to have dinner with me?
conversations.chinese: 詹尼弗，你想和我共进晚餐吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. That would be nice. When do you want to go?
conversations.reply_chinese: 好哇，不错。你想什么时候去呢？

conversations.english: Hi, Steven! What do you like to do during the weekend?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，史蒂文，你周末喜欢做什么？
conversations.reply_english: I love swimming and cycling. On Saturday morning I usually ride my bike around the city or the country road for almost two hours.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢游泳和骑自行车，星期六早上我要花两个小时骑车在城里转一转，或沿着乡间小路骑车。

conversations.english: Where did you go yesterday?
conversations.chinese: 昨天你到哪里去了？
conversations.reply_english: I went to play tennis in the public park.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我到公园里去打网球。

conversations.english: Would you care to join for the picnic tomorrow?
conversations.chinese: 明天你能参加我们的野餐活动吗？
conversations.reply_english: Much to my regret, I'll have to meet my girlfriend at the airport then.
conversations.reply_chinese: 太遗憾了，明天我要去机场接我的女友。

conversations.english: Hey, let's go out and grab a couple of beers tonight!
conversations.chinese: 嘿，今晚出去喝两杯啤酒吧。
conversations.reply_english: Sorry, I can't. I have to work late at the laboratory.
conversations.reply_chinese: 抱歉，我去不了。我得在实验室工作到很晚。

conversations.english: I haven't seen Bill lately. How is he?
conversations.chinese: 最近都没看到比尔。他怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: He's still pretty sick.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他仍然病得很严重。

conversations.english: What's the temperature today?
conversations.chinese: 今天气温多少度？
conversations.reply_english: It's about 5 degrees centigrade.
conversations.reply_chinese: 大约5摄氏度。

conversations.english: It's said that John's broken up.
conversations.chinese: 听说约翰离婚了。
conversations.reply_english: Really? But his wife has always waited on him hand and foot.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？但是他的妻子对他总是照顾得体贴入微。

title: 你觉得这部电视剧怎么样

conversations.english: What channel did you watch last night?
conversations.chinese: 你昨晚是看哪个频道？
conversations.reply_english: Channel Two. A TV series was showing on it. The name of the series is Huanzhu Gege
conversations.reply_chinese: 二频道，播电视剧《还珠格格》

conversations.english: Stand back from the door, please. Let the passengers off. You can't get on until the other passengers get off.
conversations.chinese: 请别站在车门口，让车上乘客先下来。车上乘客不下车，你也没法上车。
conversations.reply_english: How much is the fare, please?
conversations.reply_chinese: 要多少车钱？

conversations.english: This is my favourite restaurant.
conversations.chinese: 这是我最喜欢的餐厅。
conversations.reply_english: It looks very nice and the food looks delicious.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这个餐厅环境很好而且菜看起来也很好吃。

title: 你们有基因工程的书吗

conversations.english: Excuse me. Have you got any books on genetic engineering? I've looked for them everywhere,but I can't find any.
conversations.chinese: 打扰了。你们有基因工程的书吗？我到处找，但是找不到。
conversations.reply_english: I'm not sure if we've got any now. Books of that kind are on this shelf. Well, I'm afraid we've sold out.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不确定我们现在是否有。那种书都在那个架子上。额，恐怕我们已经卖光了。

conversations.english: Hi. This is the Customer Service. How can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 您好。这里是客服部。我能为您做什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hi. I bought one of your vacuums from spend-wart. It’s broken now.
conversations.reply_chinese: 您好。我在Spend-Wart买了你们生产的吸尘器。现在它坏了。

conversations.english: Where is that?
conversations.chinese: 去哪里？
conversations.reply_english: Take me to the airport,please.
conversations.reply_chinese: 请送我到机场。

conversations.english: Excuse me. I am looking for a book called Little Women, but I can't find it anywhere.
conversations.chinese: 打扰了。我在找一本叫《小妇人》的书，但是我到处都找不到。
conversations.reply_english: Let me see. I am sorry we just have sold it out.
conversations.reply_chinese: 让我看看。很抱歉，我们刚刚卖完了。

conversations.english: Do you have a good English-Chinese dictionary?
conversations.chinese: 你们有好的英汉词典吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. How about this one?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然有。这本怎么样？

conversations.english: That was a great meal, Lisa.
conversations.chinese: 丽莎，刚才那餐真丰盛。
conversations.reply_english: You're too kind.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你太客气了。

title: 昨天晚上真的不好意思

conversations.english: Hey, Ann, I am really sorry about last night. I shouldn't have said those things to you.
conversations.chinese: 嘿,安,昨天晚上真的不好意思,我不应该说那些话的.
conversations.reply_english: I am sorry too. I know we've been talking about this beach trip for a while. I should have told Bob I was busy this weekend.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也很不好意思.我们一直在说要去海滩度假,我当时就应该告诉鲍勃我这周末忙,已经有安排了.

conversations.english: I work so hard that I do not have the energy to exercise.
conversations.chinese: 我工作很辛苦以至于我没有精力去做运动。
conversations.reply_english: That is just an excuse. You can always find some time to exercise.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这只是一个借口。你总能找到时间去做运动的。

conversations.english: Hey, The Cosby Show is on!
conversations.chinese: 嘿，《天才老爹》在演了！
conversations.reply_english: The Cosby Show? Wasn't it over many years ago?
conversations.reply_chinese: 《天才老爹》？它不是好多年以前就播完了？

conversations.english: Hello. This is the Stewart Resident.
conversations.chinese: 您好。斯图尔特家。
conversations.reply_english: Hello. Is Mr. Stewart there?
conversations.reply_chinese: 您好。请问斯图尔特先生在吗？

conversations.english: Let's do something outdoors today.
conversations.chinese: 让我们做点户外运动吧
conversations.reply_english: All right. But I don't want to play tennis. We played tennis last weekend.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好吧但我不想打网球。上周末刚打过

conversations.english: Peter, how often do you exercise?
conversations.chinese: 彼得，你多久做一次运动？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I swim and run every day.
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，我每天都游泳、跑步。

conversations.english: It's getting late, Mary.
conversations.chinese: 玛丽，天色愈来愈晚了。
conversations.reply_english: Maybe I should go home.
conversations.reply_chinese: 也许我该回家了。

title: 对不起在你房间抽烟了

conversations.english: Sorry to have smoked in your room.
conversations.chinese: 对不起，在你的房间抽烟了。
conversations.reply_english: Don’t worry. I’ll open the window.
conversations.reply_chinese: 别担心。我会打开窗户的。

conversations.english: We are going out for dinner tonight. Are you coming, Betty?
conversations.chinese: 晚上我们要一起出去吃饭,贝蒂,你一块儿去吗?
conversations.reply_english: I'm not sure. I have to check my schedule. Where are you going?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不太确定,要先看一下我的安排.你们去哪儿吃饭?

conversations.english: How was your morning jog?
conversations.chinese: 你今天的晨跑如何？
conversations.reply_english: Very good. I feel quite refreshed now! You should come with me sometime - exercise is good for you!
conversations.reply_chinese: 非常好。我现在觉得神清气爽。你也应该什么时候和我一起去。锻炼对身体是很有益的！

conversations.english: Are there other chores for us to do?
conversations.chinese: 我们还得做其它杂事吗？
conversations.reply_english: We also have to vacuum the house.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们还必须用吸尘器清理房子。

conversations.english: How was your shopping trip Martin?
conversations.chinese: Martin你的购物旅程进行的怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Actually it was the most interesting day I’ve had so far.
conversations.reply_chinese: 其实这是我迄今为止度过的最有意思的一天。

conversations.english: Come on, Mary. We have to do the laundry.
conversations.chinese: 走吧，玛丽。我们必须洗衣服了。
conversations.reply_english: Where are we going?
conversations.reply_chinese: 要去哪儿？

conversations.english: Do you think the weather will be good this weekend?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得这个周末天气会好吗？
conversations.reply_english: I heard it might rain.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我听说会下雨。

conversations.english: Today is the old couple’s golden wedding.
conversations.chinese: 今天是这对老夫妇的金婚纪念日。
conversations.reply_english: That must be a long love story.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那肯定是一个很长的爱情故事。

conversations.english: Tim’s smiles are interesting.
conversations.chinese: Tim的微笑很有趣。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, they are shy and gentle but very powerful.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，他的微笑既羞涩和又温柔，丹是有征服人的力量。

conversations.english: What is wrong with Peter? He sure looks unhappy.
conversations.chinese: Peter怎么啦？他看起来很不高兴。
conversations.reply_english: His girlfriend dumped him, and he is tearing his heart out over her.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他的女朋友甩了她，他正为之心碎。

conversations.english: I'm going to try sky diving this weekend.
conversations.chinese: 这个周末我想去试试高空跳伞。
conversations.reply_english: I wouldn't do it if I were you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 如果我是你我不会去尝试。

conversations.english: Are you feeling better today, Bill?
conversations.chinese: 比尔，你今天觉得好点了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, it's hard to say. I cough a lot in the evening.
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，很难说。晚上我咳得很厉害。

conversations.english: I'm afraid I've had a terrible row with my boss. What shall I do?
conversations.chinese: 我和我老板大吵一架了。我应该怎么办？
conversations.reply_english: I think you'd better apologize.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我认为你最好道歉。

conversations.english: What shall we do after the volleyball match?
conversations.chinese: 看完排球干什么?
conversations.reply_english: How about going to the Olympic souvenir store to have a look? I remember there is one in the gym.
conversations.reply_chinese: 去逛逛奥运纪念品专卖店怎么样？我记得体育馆里有一家。

title: 把房间收拾干净 Tidy up the room

conversations.english: What a mess, Jack!
conversations.chinese: 杰克，你怎么弄的乱七八糟。
conversations.reply_english: I’m playing with my toys, Dad.
conversations.reply_chinese: 爸爸，我在玩我的玩具。

title: 给他们找点儿事做 Keep them occupied

conversations.english: Ann! Don’t you see the children are making so much noise here? Why don’t you keep them occupied and out their mother’s hair?
conversations.chinese: 安！你难道没看见这些孩子在这里有多吵吗？你为什么不让它们做点什么事情，别人他们在这里烦他们的母亲！
conversations.reply_english: OK! What about taking them outside and flying a kite.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的！带他们到外面去放风筝如何？

title: 儿子放学后心情一直不好

conversations.english: Where is our son, dear?
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，我们的儿子在哪里？
conversations.reply_english: He is in his bedroom. He has been in a bad mood after school.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他在他的卧室里，放学后，他就一直心情不好。

title: 如何教育孩子让我大伤脑经

conversations.english: I have puzzled my brain about how to teach the children.
conversations.chinese: 关于如何教育孩子真让我大伤脑经。
conversations.reply_english: What is your problem?
conversations.reply_chinese: 出什么问题了？

title: 街上有一件严重的扰乱事件

conversations.english: There was a serious disturbance in the street this morning.
conversations.chinese: 今天早上，街上有一件严重的扰乱事件。
conversations.reply_english: Is it kept in hand now?
conversations.reply_chinese: 现在得以控制了吗？

title: 请借给我一些钱 Lend me some money

conversations.english: Please lend me some money.
conversations.chinese: 请借些钱给我？
conversations.reply_english: OK, do you want it urgently?
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，你有急用吗？

conversations.english: I really don’t understand my parents. They always make light of my worries.
conversations.chinese: 我真不明白我的父母，他们总是轻视我的烦恼。
conversations.reply_english: They think you are just a child.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他们认为你只是个孩子。

title: 你从窗户跳下去多傻呀

conversations.english: How silly of you to jump out of the window!
conversations.chinese: 你从窗户跳下去多傻呀！
conversations.reply_english: But that was the first thing that came into my mind when I heard the shout earthquake!
conversations.reply_chinese: 可当我听到地震了的喊声时，那时我的第一个反映。

title: 我正在找一只隐形眼镜

conversations.english: What are you looking for?
conversations.chinese: 你在找什么呀？
conversations.reply_english: I lost one of my contact lenses, and I’m searching high and low for it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我丢了一只隐形眼镜，我正到处在找。

conversations.english: Jack, let’s go!
conversations.chinese: 杰克，咱们走。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, you are out of breath! What happened?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，看你，上气不接下气！出什么事情呢？

title: 我不知道如何去教育儿子

conversations.english: I really don’t know how to teach my son. He's getting far above himself.
conversations.chinese: 我真不知道如何去教育儿子。他现在太目中无人了。
conversations.reply_english: You should send him to the boarding school. He need a strict teacher.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你应该送他去寄宿学校，他需要一个严厉点的老师。

title: 我想把花瓶放在架子上

conversations.english: What are you doing?
conversations.chinese: 你在干什么？
conversations.reply_english: I’m trying to put the vase on the shelf.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想把这个花瓶放在架子上。

conversations.english: But you should be considerate to the kids, it’s their nature to play.
conversations.chinese: 但是你该体贴孩子们，爱玩是他们的天性。
conversations.reply_english: What I cannot put up with is that they may even give me a back talk.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我受不了的是他们居然和我顶嘴。

conversations.english: Can you please give me a hand? I can’t carry the heavy box.
conversations.chinese: 请你帮帮忙好吗？我搬不动那个重箱子。
conversations.reply_english: I’m afraid not. Don’t you see I’m looking up a word in the dictionary?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我恐怕帮不了你，你没看见我在查字典吗？

title: 你能帮我搬下这些书吗

conversations.english: Could you help me with these books?
conversations.chinese: 你能帮我搬下这些书吗？
conversations.reply_english: My hands are full. Can’t you see that?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很忙，你没看到吗？

title: 爸爸能买个新相机给我么

conversations.english: Dad, can you buy a new camera? My old one has gone west.
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，能买个新相机给我么？我的旧的那个坏了。
conversations.reply_english: What? I gave it to you only 3 months ago.
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么？我三个月前才给你买的。

conversations.english: We have been over this a hundred times! We are not getting a pet!
conversations.chinese: 我们谈论这个已经很多次了。我们不会养宠物。
conversations.reply_english: Why not? Come on! Just a cute little puppy or a kitty!
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么不？养吧。只养一只可爱的小狗或小猫.

conversations.english: Good morning, May. Good girl, you are reading English books again.
conversations.chinese: 阿美，早上好。真是好孩子，又在读英语了！
conversations.reply_english: Good morning. There is no reason to miss so beautiful a morning. Is that a new bird?
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好。没有理由错过这么美丽的早晨。那是只新鸟吗？

conversations.english: That's OK, Ben, just let it go. I thought you were just a little too much into it.
conversations.chinese: 好了，本，都过去了。我还以为你只是有点奇怪。
conversations.reply_english: I wasn't kidding before, OK, I'm fine now.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我刚才可没有开玩笑，不过我现在已经好了。

title: 在家乡教堂结婚我都准备好了

conversations.english: There's so much to do and so little time.
conversations.chinese: 事情这么多，时间都不够用。
conversations.reply_english: I know. Did your mom double check on the church reservations?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道。你妈妈有再去确定预订的教堂吗？

title: 我的马克杯怎么会在外面的垃圾袋里

conversations.english: I think I found my Yankee's mug...
conversations.chinese: 我想我找到洋基队的马克杯了……
conversations.reply_english: Oh, great. Where was it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 喔，太好了。在哪找到的？

title: 跟你妈妈多拿些旧照片

conversations.english: Hey! Ask your mom for more old pictures, OK?
conversations.chinese: 嘿！跟你妈妈多拿些旧照片好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Can't it wait? She's still angry that we sent e-mail wedding invitations.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不能缓一缓吗？她还在气我们用电子邮件寄喜帖的事。

title: 昨晚你怎么不给我发短息

conversations.english: Why didn't you text me last night?
conversations.chinese: 昨晚你为什么不给我发信息？
conversations.reply_english: What? I sent you three or four messages!
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么？我给你发了三四条短信！

title: 你妈妈会继续念叨你的

conversations.english: So your mom can stop nagging you now.
conversations.chinese: 所以你妈不会再念你了。
conversations.reply_english: Trust me. She'll keep nagging. She thinks something will go wrong.
conversations.reply_chinese: 相信我。她还是会继续念。她觉得会出差错。

conversations.english: How's the bride-to-be?
conversations.chinese: 当准新娘的感觉如何啊？
conversations.reply_english: Tired and stressed. This wedding is giving me a headache.
conversations.reply_chinese: 又累压力又大。这次的婚礼让我头好痛。

conversations.english: Steve, thanks for looking after Johnny.
conversations.chinese: 史帝，谢谢你照顾强尼。
conversations.reply_english: It was a pleasure, Mrs. Robinson.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很乐意，罗宾森太太。

title: 能借给我点钱吗下周就还给你

conversations.english: Can I borrow five bucks?
conversations.chinese: 能借给我5美元吗？
conversations.reply_english: No!
conversations.reply_chinese: 不行！

title: 我想定做三件一套的衣服

conversations.english: Hello, sir, what can I do for you today?
conversations.chinese: 先生，您好，需要点什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hello, I need a new suit. I have an important interview next week, so I really need to look sharp.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我需要买套新衣服。下周我有个重要的采访，所以我得看起来很有型。

conversations.english: What are you doing? Checking the "to do" list for the wedding?
conversations.chinese: 你在做什么？确定婚礼的待办事项吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yep. There's still so much to do!
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，还有好多事要做喔！

title: 我想在网站上做个聊天室

conversations.english: So, got any more ideas for the website?
conversations.chinese: 那你对网站还有想法吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, since we're collecting gifts instead of red envelopes, I made a "for guests only" gift chat room.
conversations.reply_chinese: 既然我们只收礼物，不收礼金，我做了一个「宾客专属」聊天室。

conversations.english: Good Morning, Mrs. Schmidt! I see you're standing on your head again.
conversations.chinese: 早安，史太太！瞧妳又在倒立了。
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Kathy! I'm just doing my morning yoga! You're up awfully early today.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，凯晰！我只是在做晨间瑜珈！你今儿个起得还真早。

title: 把存钱罐里的零钱整理下

conversations.english: Help me organize these coins.
conversations.chinese: 帮我理一下那些硬币。
conversations.reply_english: That's a lot of money! What did you do? Break the piggy bank?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这么多钱！你做什么了？把存钱罐打碎了吗？

title: 我们正在等待接种疫苗

conversations.english: Hello Mrs Parker, how have you been?
conversations.chinese: 帕克先生你好，最近好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Hello Dr Peters. Just fine thank you. Ricky and I are here for his vaccines.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，彼得医生。我很好，谢谢。我和里基在这里等注射疫苗。

title: 我建议您用针灸来治疗头疼

conversations.english: What's wrong?
conversations.chinese: 出什么事了？
conversations.reply_english: I have a headache. These past few days I've been living off painkillers. Man, I feel like my head is going to explode.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我头疼。这些天我就靠止痛药为生了。哥们，我觉得我的头就要爆炸了。

title: 你们家的亲戚关系把我弄糊涂了

conversations.english: What are you doing this weekend?
conversations.chinese: 这周末你做什么？
conversations.reply_english: My brother-in-law is having a small get-together at his house and he invited me.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我姐夫要在他家开个聚会，并且他邀请了我。

title: 我们男生也需要做皮肤护理

conversations.english: You want to go get a facial with me today?
conversations.chinese: 你今天想和我一起去做面部按摩吗？
conversations.reply_english: Dude, what are you talking about? Only girls do that.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哥们，你在说什么呢？那是女孩子做的事。

title: 叫杀虫公司的人来清理房间害虫

conversations.english: Hi, did you call for an exterminator?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，你给专业杀虫的人打电话了？
conversations.reply_english: Yes! Thank goodness you’re here.These bugs are driving us crazy!
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，谢天谢地，你终于来了。这些虫子都把我们逼疯了。

title: 早晨起床总是耽误很长时间

conversations.english: Stephanie! Did you just get to school? But you were up and about when I left the dorm this morning! That was about an hour and a half ago. This happens all the time! Why do you always take so long to get ready the morning?
conversations.chinese: Stephanie!你去上学了吗？今天早晨我离开寝室时，你已经起床并四处活动。那是大约一个半小时的事。总是这样。早晨为什么你要花很长的时间来准备吗？
conversations.reply_english: It’s a skill. What can I say? I don’t know why, I just have a long routine.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是种技巧。我能说什么？我不知道原因。我只是做些日常的事。

title: 组织很棒的婴儿送礼会

conversations.english: Thank you for organizing this great baby shower for me! I’ve always been to baby showers but never actually had one held for me! Let’s get started!
conversations.chinese: 谢谢你们为我组织这个很棒的婴儿送礼会。我一直参加别人的婴儿送礼会，但从未为我组织过。现在我们就开始吧.
conversations.reply_english: Ok, let’s start opening some presents!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们来打开礼物吧。

conversations.english: Do you want to go catch a movie tonight?
conversations.chinese: 你今晚想看电影吗？
conversations.reply_english: I can't, I have to go to the gym.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不想，我要去健身房。

title: 我要种个属于自己的园子

conversations.english: I’ve decided to grow my own garden!
conversations.chinese: 我决定要种个属于自己的园子。
conversations.reply_english: What? You don’t know the first thing about gardening!
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么？你对园艺一无所知。

title: 全球发生了极端的气象现象

conversations.english: Those are the headlines for today, and now for the international weather report with Mike Sanderson.
conversations.chinese: 这些就是今天的新闻摘要，现在一起来看Mike Sanderson主持的国际天气预报。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you, Bob! This past week has been the beginning of Armageddon for many, a series of unprecedented meteorological events occurred around the world. In Switzerland, a major avalanche was reported in the Alps. Fortunately, no one was injured. Due to to the extreme cold this winter, a blizzard has struck the US Midwest, causing classes in schools and universities to be temporarily canceled.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你，鲍伯。过去的一周成为大决战的开始，全球各地发生了一系列的极端气象现象。在瑞典，阿尔卑斯山脉发生了一次雪崩。幸运的是，没人受伤。受这个冬天极寒的影响，一场暴风雪袭击了美国中西部，导致学校和大学的一些课程被迫取消。

conversations.english: Hey honey, how was your day?
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，今天过得如何？
conversations.reply_english: It was alright. I ran into Bill and we got to talking for a while. He’s in a bit of a jam.
conversations.reply_chinese: 还行。我碰见比尔了，我们说了会儿话。他现在有些困难。

conversations.english: Honey, the baby is up again.
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，宝贝又醒了.
conversations.reply_english: It’s your turn! I went last night.
conversations.reply_chinese: 轮到你照看婴儿了。我昨晚已经照看婴儿了。

title: 妈妈你看见我勺子了吗

conversations.english: Mom, help me with the bowls, please! I can't hold them.
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，拜托帮我拿一下碗，我抓不住了。
conversations.reply_english: Be careful, honey.
conversations.reply_chinese: 宝贝，小心点。
